name: Name
registerSuccess: The registration has been completed, now you can login.
registerWithProblemsMessage: The registration was not completed correctly, please try in a few minutes
forgotPasswordSuccess: The recovery email was sent successfully, please check your inbox
forgotPasswordWithProblemsMessage: Recovery email was not sent. If the email provided is correct and you have a network, wait a few moments and try again.
thisFieldMustBeAValidEmail: This field must be a valid email
thePasswordMustHaveMinLength: The password must have min length 8
thisFieldMustBeANumericValue: This field must be a numeric value
noteReadSuccessfully: Note read successfully! The note is in process, soon you will be able to view it in the app
readAnotherNote: Do you want to read another note?
hasAlreadyBeenRead: This invoice has already been read, it is already in processing or available in the app
invalidStateMessage: The system is not yet available for the state (Federative Unit) of this note, save it for now, soon you can add it to the app.
tryAgainMessage: There was a problem reading the note, please try again
deleteItemDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
problemsWithLoginDescription: There was a problem with the login, the most common problems are: incorrect email or password and device disconnected. If your problem is not one of these, wait a few moments and try again.
